## ShippingMethodFragment variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ShippingMethodFragment = "\n  fragment DefaultShippingMethod on ShippingMethod {\n    id\n    version\n    name\n    isDefault\n    localizedDescription(acceptLanguage: $acceptLanguage)\n    zoneRates {\n      zone {\n        id\n        name\n      }\n      shippingRates {\n        freeAbove {\n          type\n          centAmount\n        }\n        isMatching\n        price {\n          centAmount\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n"
```
